name: @ifedex/simply-direct
description: A unified fullstack communication approach for NestJS + Angular with bidirectional real-time sync via sockets.
author: FVilli

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && copyfiles ./package.json ./README.md ./README-1.svg ./README-2.svg ./LICENSE dist
scripts.do:publish: npm run build && npm version patch && git commit -am "v$(npm version patch)" && git tag v$(npm version patch) && git push && git push --tags
scripts.try:publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public --dry-run
